meanings.definition: A salt or ester of terephthalic acid.
meanings.sent1: The laboratory assistant mixed various terephthalates to observe their reactions.
meanings.sent2: The company produces terephthalates for use in manufacturing different materials.
meanings.sent3: The terephthalates in the beaker decided to throw a party to celebrate their chemical bond.
meanings.sent4: The terephthalates in the mixture danced together, creating a colorful display under the microscope.
meanings.sent5: The terephthalates formed a strong alliance, bonding tightly to achieve stability.

meanings.definition: A type of polyester resin used in the production of plastic bottles.
meanings.sent1: The factory imported terephthalates to make durable plastic bottles.
meanings.sent2: Consumers prefer products made with terephthalates due to their quality.
meanings.sent3: The terephthalates in the mold joked about becoming famous as water bottle material.
meanings.sent4: The terephthalates transformed into plastic bottles, ready to hold refreshing drinks.
meanings.sent5: The terephthalates flowed smoothly, shaping into perfect containers for beverages.
